bibl.title: The Thracians in Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: Version originale: Les Thraces en Égypte ptolémaïque, Pulpudeva. Semaines philippopolitaines de l'histoire et de la culture thrace. 4. Plovdiv, 3-17 octobre 1980 (Sofia, 1983) pp. 72-79.
BINGEN Jean, The Thracians in Ptolemaic Egypt.
Jean BINGEN, Hellenistic Egypt. Monarchy, Society, Economy, Culture. Edited with an Introduction by Roger S. BAGNALL (Edinburgh, 2007) pp. 83-93, 1 fig.
